courage: Courage isn't the absence of fear - it's feeling the fear and choosing love anyway
Your sensitivity is not a weakness - it's a superpower disguised as vulnerability
authenticity: The world needs your weird, not your perfect
You are not too much - you are exactly enough for someone who is meant to receive your gifts
spiritual_growth: Growth doesn't always feel good, but it always leads somewhere beautiful
Your struggles are not punishments - they're invitations to discover your strength
relationships: Love is not about finding someone to complete you - it's about finding someone to explore completeness with
The best relationships are laboratories for mutual spiritual evolution
